entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Clyde River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Near blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Near blizzard developing early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 70 early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Near blizzard. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending in the morning then light snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 then becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
